tool.name: DBKit Create

param.name: input
param.label: List of Identifiers
param.help: Specify a list containing all entry identifiers to be downloaded.

param.name: url
param.label: URL to External Source
param.help: Specify the URL to the external database source.

param.name: idextension
param.label: Identifier Extensions
param.help: Specify the extension of the identifier (optional).

param.name: idlength
param.label: Identifier Length
param.help: Specify the length of the identifier (disable=0).

param.name: idcase
param.label: Identifier Case
param.help: Choose to format the identifier by changing its case (optional).

tool.help: This database creation tool downloads entries from an external resource and creates a datasets with all its contents. Additionally an index file is generated indicating the start and end of every entry within the database file.
